segment.source: How to Change User Access Permissions

segment.source: How to Change User Access Permissions
segment.target: How to Change User Access Permissions

segment.source: How to Change User Access Permissions
segment.target: How to Change User Access Permissions

segment.source: Use the following procedure to change user access permissions in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to change user access permissions in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.

segment.source: Before changing users access permissions, ensure that any permissions changes are consistent with the organization's guidelines for granting user access.
segment.target: Before changing users access permissions, ensure that any permissions changes are consistent with the organization's guidelines for granting user access.

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization node, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization node, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: On the Permissions tab on the Properties dialog box, scroll through the list of permissions and select the check boxes that correspond to the permissions you want to grant to users of this computer.
segment.target: On the Permissions tab on the Properties dialog box, scroll through the list of permissions and select the check boxes that correspond to the permissions you want to grant to users of this computer.

segment.source: Administrators have access to all the permissions regardless of the settings on this tab.
segment.target: Administrators have access to all the permissions regardless of the settings on this tab.

segment.source: Click OK or Apply to change the setting.
segment.target: Click OK or Apply to change the setting.
